about_the_game:
Alligator and a fox inside a transforming monster truck? Does the alligator even have a driving license? Where are they going? What are they doing?! We're about to find out!

Rallygator is a physics based platforming game, in which you control a multi-functional ever transforming monster truck! Solve puzzles and do tricky stunts while you're at it!

Hop and drive around in car mode, dive into the deep waters in submarine mode, you can even turn into a mini-truck and drive through tight spaces. Lots more surprises are waiting for you in Rallygator!

Three level demo for Rallygator. Have fun!

name: Rallygator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 32-64bit versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: +2 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 TI or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A physics based platforming/driving game. You control a multi-functional-transforming-monster-truck that has a monster inside! Solve puzzles, go for a adventure and do tricky stunts while you're at it!
